document.full_text: the boston bruins scored four unanswered goals in the third period to beat philadelphia 5-1 and sweep their eastern conference semi-final as the detroit red wings beat san jose 4-3 to extend their series with the sharks.
document.title: bruins bounce flyers, red wings avoid sweep
lines_and_colors: the boston bruins scored four unanswered goals in the third period to beat philadelphia 5-1 and sweep their eastern conference semi-final as the detroit red wings beat san jose 4-3 to extend their series with the sharks.
